column1: Sofitel Wroclaw Old Town will not start again after CoViD-19 clousure. It is not known what the future of the building will be.
good to know....love that part of town,excellent location so no doubt someone will snap it up should conditions get better or at least not deteriorate
On what date did it close? My parents were supposed to be staying there last month, but cancelled. Just wondering what would have happened if they hadn't cancelled.
